src_original: putreṇa tulyaḥ sthūlaḥ /  putreṇa tulyo gomān // [493]

tatra iti saptamīsamarthāt tasya iti ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāc ca iva-arthe vatiḥ pratyayo bhavati /  mathurāyām iva mathurāvat srughne prākāraḥ /  ṣaṣthīsamarthāt - devadattasya iva devadattavat yajñādattasya gāvaḥ /  yajñadattasya iva yajñadattavat devadattasya dantāḥ //
tgt_original: mathurāyāmiva mathurāvat srughne prākāraḥ |  caitrasyeva caitravanmaitrasya gāvaḥ |

src_original: udgatāni nigatāni ca //  tasya bhāvas tva-talau // PS_5,1.119 //  _____START JKv_5,1.119:  tasya iti ṣaṣthīsamarthād bhāvaḥ ity etasmninn arthe tavatalau pratyayau bhavataḥ /  śabdasya pravṛtti-nimittaṃ bhāva-śabdena+ucyate /  aśvasya bhāvaḥ aśvatvam, aśvatā /
gotvam, gotā //  ā ca tvāt // PS_5,1.120 //  _____START JKv_5,1.120:  brahmaṇas tvaḥ (*5,1.136)  iti vakṣyati /

mradimā, mārdavam,  mṛdutvam, mṛdutā /  apavādaiḥ saha samāveśārthaṃ vacanam /  karmaṇi ca vidhānārthaṃ guṇavacana-brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ karmaṇi ca (*5,1.124) iti /  cakāro nañsnañbhyām api samāveśa-arthaḥ /
svāṅgavācī yaḥ sakthiśabdaḥ akṣiśabdaś ca tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ ṣac pratyayo bhavati samāsāntaḥ /
tgt_original: bahuvrīhau sakthyakṣṇoḥ svāṅgāt ṣac | 5 | 4 | 113 |  svāṅgavācisakthyakṣyantādbahuvrīheḥ ṣac |

src_original: dīrghaskthi śakaṭam sthulākṣiḥ ikṣuḥ /  ṭaci prakṛte ṣajgrahaṇaṃ svarārtham /  cakrasakthī strī /  dīrghasakthī strī /  tatra yasmin pakṣe na asty udāttatvaṃ tatra ṅīpi sati udāttanivṛttisvarasya abhāvād anudāttaḥ śrūyeta /  ṅīṣi tu sarvatra+udāttaḥ siddho bhavati /

caturthī tadartha-artha-bali-hita-sukha-rakṣitaiḥ // PS_2,1.36 //  tat iti sarvanāmnā caturthyantasya arthaḥ parāmṛśyate /  tasmai idaṃ tadartham /  tadartha artha bali hita sukha rakṣita ity etaiḥ saha caturthyantaṃ samasyate,
tgt_original: caturthī tadarthārthabalihitasukharakṣitaiḥ | 2 | 1 | 36 |  caturthyantārthāya yat tadvācinā arthādibhiśca caturthyantaṁ vā prāgvat |

src_original: tatpuruṣaś ca samāso bhavati /  tadarthena prakṛtivikārabhāve samāso 'yam iṣyate /  kuṇḍlāya hiraṇyam kuṇḍalahiraṇyam /
tgt_original: yūpāya dāru |  yūpadāru |  tadarthena prakṛtivikṛtibhāva eveṣṭaḥ |

src_original: avahananāya ulūkhalam iti /  tādarthye caturthī ca asmād eva jñāpakād bhavati /  arthena nityasamāsavacanaṃ sarvaliṅgatā ca vaktavyā /
brāhmaṇārthaṃ payaḥ /  brāhmaṇārthā yavāgūḥ /  bali - kuberāya baliḥ kuberabaliḥ /  mahārājabaliḥ /
tgt_original: dvijāyā- (329) yam |  dvijārthaḥ sūpaḥ |  dvijārthā yavāgūḥ |  dvijārthaṁ payaḥ |

src_original: aśvahitam /  sukha - gosukham /  aśvasukham /  rakṣita - gorakṣitam /  aśvarakṣitam //  pañcamī bhayena // PS_2,1.37 //  _____START JKv_2,1.37:
sup supā iti vartate /  tasya viśeṣaṇam etat /  pañcamyantaṃ subanataṃ bhaya-śabdena /  caurabhayam /
apoḍha - kalpanāpoḍhaḥ /  mukta - cakramuktaḥ /  patita - svargapatitaḥ /
tgt_original: avayavinā saha pūrvādayaḥ samasyante ekatvasaṁkhyāviśiṣṭaścedavaya- vī |

src_original: nipātanāt suḍāgamaḥ //  saptamyantaṃ śauṇḍa-ādibhiḥ saha samasyate,
